definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Le 14:10 a liquid measure (NH id.; Aram. [[לוּגָּה]]; also lago0, lagto0 a (dessert –) dish, etc.; mng. of √ dub.; Thes comp. Ar. laj=a be deep, luj=un depth, abyss);—´[[ל]] abs. Le 14:10; cstr. v:Le 14:12 + 3 t. Le 14; always of oil ([[שֶׁמֶן]]) Le 14:10, Le 14:12, Le 14:15, Le 14:21, Le 14:24 (P; all in law of purif. of leper); acc. to Talm.= 1/12 hin (v. [[הִין]] supr. p. 228; Zuckermann:Jüd. Masssystem, 49) i.e. c. 1/2 litre; Benz:Arch. 182, 184 Now:Arch. i. 204f.
